title: Update Failed

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Ive posted about this before and the rioter just linked me to a permission page thing but it didnt help at all ive tried every way of fixing my league but it doesn't work, ive used all the steps on the  permission guide and nothing has happened ive also used the hextech repair tool. My league loads up perfectly fine and then it scans like 5 files before updating it will get to about 1-3% and say Update Failed check Logs for more information please help ive tried everything.

replies.body:
Hmm, that's definitely the issues that permission errors cause. Where do you have your League installed? Is it somewhere other than C > Riot Games? I believe this can also cause problems.

Only other thing I can think of to check if your computer time is correct. If it isn't I believe this can cause communication errors.
